personal-allowance.title: Should We Abolish the Personal Allowance?
personal-allowance.abstract: A compact analysis of the distributional impact of replacing the Personal Allowance with an equivalent basic income, by age and disposable income deciles.

marginal-tax-rates.title: Marginal Tax Rates in the Tax System
marginal-tax-rates.abstract: An outline of the different marginal rates applying to different sources and compositions of income.
